scripts.build: npm --workspace @panisul/backend run build && npm --workspace @panisul/frontend run build
scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace @panisul/backend run typecheck && npm --workspace @panisul/frontend run typecheck
scripts.setup: ([ -f apps/backend/.env ] || cp apps/backend/.env.example apps/backend/.env 2>/dev/null || cp apps/backend/ENV.EXAMPLE apps/backend/.env) && npm run --workspace @panisul/backend prisma:generate && npm run --workspace @panisul/backend prisma:migrate && npm run --workspace @panisul/backend db:seed
scripts.setup:dev: npm run setup && npm run dev
